message: Whether you fall or fail, whether you cry or sob, all you can look forward to is that your dad believes in you. He picks you up, brushes you off, and lets you try again." There is no one in your life like your father who protects you, keeps pushing you forward, stresses on the fundamentals and teaches you responsibility. Student Welfare Group - SWG, IIT Kharagpur celebrates these real life heroes and wishes them a Happy Father's Day.

message:
Hey,

As you know, we have launched the app of our startup "Rhymly" that helps you search rhymes & meanings of common Hindi words, create original couplets & discover kick-ass content every day.

I'll be obliged if you could take out some valuable time of yours to check out the app, give me personal feedback on it & share it via your FB timeline.

Download Link: http://bit.ly/RhymlyAppFB

 ~ Anybody Can Rhyme

Student Welfare Group - SWG, IIT Kharagpur shared Awaaz, IIT Kharagpur's post. Pavan Kumar Maddala, a first year UG student from the Department of Mechanical Engineering is suffering from hearing problem since his childhood. This problem has severely affected his first year at IIT Kgp as he was unable to listen to the lectures. Now, as suggested by the doctors he is in immediate need of a surgery failing to which he could lose his hearing ability forever. This surgery costs INR 10 lakhs. Considering the fact that he belongs to a poor background, the arrangement of this amount needs our immediate help. We urge the student community to come together and help this needy KGPian! For donation and details please visit- https://www.ketto.org/fundraiser/Helppavankumar#/action/edit

message:
We lost few of our friends over a period of time. Every time we lose someone we remember their deeds... We remember how their mere presence was an integral part of our daily lives. Even though we do not know the person but the loss of their life feels like a loss of one's own family member. It does have an effect on each one of us in some way or the other.  
We, from our side, have always tried our best to maintain the deserved harmony but, can this be achieved by the sole effort of one??? 
This small video by Rakesh Tiwari makes us realize how all of us can take care of the society, how our small chitchat can make someone feel better, how our actions influence others and what drives the emotions within.
Ruminate...
story: Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur is with Spill Poetry.

message: Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur shared Spill Poetry's post. Rakesh Tiwari comes with a heart-wrenchingly beautiful poem, which teaches us a very important thing which we all seems to have forgotten "Listening" #StartListening. Written and Performed by - Rakesh Tiwari
story: Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur shared Spill Poetry's post.

message: Anju Joon shared a post to Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur's timeline. When you’re a child, she walks before you to set an example. When you’re a teenager, she walks behind you to be there should you need her. When you’re an adult, she walks beside you so that as two friends you can enjoy life together. Happy Mother's Day to all the dearest and loving mothers whose love and affection is unforgettable.

message: Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur shared a group. Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur present to you the Official IIT Kharagpur's JEE Counseling Group. This group intends to solve your doubts regarding any information about courses offered at IIT KGP, future prospects related to different fields, placements' data and campus environment extended here at IIT Kharagpur. Post all your doubts and queries in this group and there are many seniors out there in the group who will be more than happy to answer all your queries. We hope to contribute our part effectively to let you make an informed and right decision. Happy Counselling!!
story: Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur shared a group.

Attention Freshers!!
Want to do something meaningful for the betterment of the student community? Here's one of the most sought-after opportunities; to be a part of an organization which will provide you with a platform to make KGP life better. Student Welfare Group IIT Kharagpur (a student body under the Office of Dean of Students' Affairs) invites applications from all the UG 1st years to be a part of the team.
Do not miss this one time chance. 

Register now at: http://bit.ly/2ptxh9N

With the mid-sems done and dusted, all of you must be looking forward to learn something new so Student Welfare Group in association with  Neurapses technology brings you the perfect opportunity. Machine Learning in today’s world is indispensable. Its applications range from Data Security to Financial Trading, from Bioinformatics to Optimization and Metaheuristic and is touted as the next big thing in the world. With increasing applicability in every sector and perceived future expansion to all domains, it is a skill worth investing your time on. With more than 90% non-core companies offering jobs in this profile, it is one of the most sought-after skill in the present scenario.  
So gear up, and prepare yourself to delve deeper into the Science of Machine Learning! But keep in mind that seats are limited so hurry up & register now!
Register here :https://goo.gl/forms/LJK8JuZzWk0WLFCC2

| Undergraduate Department Representative Elections |

The institute invites applications from the students for the UG Department Representative elections. Students who are interested can look at the complete procedure and eligibility criteria in the following document:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1b3ljjmssidTqiHl-npAwQIX80ztttbpo/view?usp=sharing

The application form can be found here:

Students are encouraged to fill their nominations on time.

"A mind troubled by doubt cannot focus on the course to victory.”
With midsem approaching in just about two weeks it is the right time to gear up for your preparation and clear all your doubts. PDS doubt session for UG 1st year student is going to be held on all Saturdays and Sundays starting from 3rd February 2018. Do attend the session as we plan to provide you a short recap of some of the important topics and make you practice with tutorials designed specifically for midsem. 
Timings:6:00-8:00pm
Venue: F-235 (Main Building)
Be there!!

Extending the PDS Doubt Sessions to include a live coding experience Student Welfare Group is hosting an Online Coding Challenge for freshers to give you a chance to hone your skills. The duration of the challenge will be 1 week and starts today 8 PM. Do not miss this opportunity to test your skills!! Try your fingers on Freshers Challenge specially made for you and experience fun of live coding.
1st Year UG Students can register in the link below :
https://www.hackerrank.com/swg-iitkgp-freshers-coding-challenge
Any Queries Contact : Pushpendra Singh (9609765521)

Also join official group of PDS for any doubts :https://www.facebook.com/groups/191956941388033/

Avijit Saha, a student at the Department of Aerospace Engineering, has been awarded the prestigious ASME IGTI Student Scholarship of USD 2000 for the academic year 2017-18. ASME International Gas Turbine Institute has contributed over a million dollars in scholarships since initiating this service in 1986.  Here comes the Foresight post in which he shares his experience about the same .

Arduino is an open-source computer hardware that designs and manufactures microcontroller kits for building digital devices and interactive objects that can sense and control objects in the physical world. Arduino has become one of the pillars of the maker movement thanks to its wonderful design and ease of use.
Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur in association with Mechatron Robotic provides you with a golden opportunity to get going into the fascinating loop of digital electronics. Register fast so that you can receive the software and relevant materials in advance.
Registration is on a first come first serve basis and we have limited seats.
So hurry up and book your seats fast to get empowered with a new and exciting skill.
Register yourself in the link given below:
https://goo.gl/S1eJqU

Mimamsa IISER Pune shared a post to Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur's timeline. #Mimamsa2018 The wait is almost over! Registrations open now for the tenth edition of India's biggest Scientific quizzing event. Register in teams of four, at : http://mimamsa.iiserpune.ac.in/ Inviting all first, second and third year undergraduates. Registration portal will be active from 7th November to 20th December, 2017. Hurry! Cash prizes worth ₹1,15,000 to be won! #AreYouInquizitive #TenYearsOfMimamsa

YourDost is finally here guys!

YourDOST is an online counseling and emotional support platform designed to foster mental wellness

Here are the steps you need to follow for registration:
1) Please visit the site(www.yourdost.com).
Make sure you are connected to the IIT kgp wifi, only then you access the services for free. Although once you are registered from here, you can use its services from anywhere. 
2) You can sign up with any email id and put up any username of your choice. There are various career experts, life coaches and counsellors present. You can anonymously chat with any of them.
3) Voice call and video call can also be arranged by booking an appointment from website itself. 

Every chat, voice and video call is accessible and it's totally an anonymous platform.

Placement season is here again and in our bid to provide more information based career decisions to the student community and increase overall awareness, we present our next post, in which Naman Bhatia  talks about his placement experience, preparation, working condition in Credit Suisse and what not?
We thank Naman Bhatia for such a insightful post and hope him best of luck ahead, and to all of you guys sitting for placement🙂
